title: The After Show Talks About Cigars That Nurse Away Stress
itunes:title: The After Show Talks About Cigars That Nurse Away Stress
description:
This week, Oliver Nivaud joins us to discuss whether cigar smoking is the best medicine for stress. Can a cigar help manage your stress?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
